title: Location, Volume 4
description: a (book):  grey cover; 3 folded black paper constructions affixed to pages with black photo corners; dark polygon shapes--blue and red printed over each other, slighty off center; 3 pages of text; other abstract imagery; one page intentionally torn at top and bottom; b (paper construction):  loose artwork in back of book:  "Performering" by Jennifer Danos and John Fleischer; folded and cut black and white striped paper forming oblong geometric shape with points on long sides and opening at center; black stitching at center of plastic sleeve affixes paper construction inside plastic; separate label with print with artists' signatures in pencil; numbered 5/100
